DOC.brief_summary: Investigate therapeutic effect antioxidant N-acetylcysteine early outcome decease renal transplant patient .
DOC.brief_title: Protective Effect N-acetylcysteine Early Outcomes Deceased Renal Transplant
DOC.detailed_description: Investigate therapeutic effect 600 mg bid po N-acetylcysteine early outcome decease renal transplant patient regard oxidative stress renal function . Adult primary graft recipient decease renal donor randomly assign treatment ( NAC ) control group prospectively evaluate 90 day . Treatment group receive N-acetylcysteine 600 mg bid po 0 7th postoperative day ( PO ) . Renal function determine serum creatinine , Cockroft-Gault estimate GFR ( eGFR ) 7th , 15th , 30th , 60th 90th PO dialysis free Kaplan-Meier estimate curve . Serum level thiobarbituric acid reactive substance ( TBARS ) , marker lipid peroxidation oxidative stress , determine use thiobarbituric acid assay 0-7th PO . Statistical analysis perform use SPSS 16.0 .
DOC.criteria: primary decease renal transplant recipient adult ( > 18 yo ) unable drink Nacetylcysteine first 7 PO participation study
